version_description:
- Shop offer overhaul
- General bug fixing

- Added: Animations for golden hint arrows in Tutorial
- Added: Successful/failed resource purchase result dialogs
- Changed: Shortened regeneration timers of HP, Morale, Infection, and resurrection
- Changed: Item spawn distribution and probabilities tweaked
- Changed: Amount of Fuel contained in canisters tweaked
- Changed: Warning message about not having enough space in storage when buying resource packages from Shop is now more understandable
- Changed: Zoom level - zoom out was set as a default option
- Changed: Decreased reloading time for arrow based weapons
- Changed: Decreased range of some melee weapons
- Changed: Max damage for sword and sledgehammer (now they have a lower chance to one-shot low tier Infected)
- Fixed: Ammo is doubling its quantity and sometimes even disappearing during the transfers in Inventory
- Fixed: NPCs have been slowed down in areas different than the player
- Fixed: Text corrections of Tutorial, Raid logs, Level names, and descriptions, buildings descriptions and items descriptions
- General tutorial improvements
- General bug fixing

- Added: Death Tutorial
- Added: Minimap for manual raids
- Added: Items with generalized description received new, individual description keys
- Added: New warehouse building into Factory, Port and Mall levels
- Added: Forest biome now has its own dirt road visuals
- Added: Village, Subtown, Battlefield biomes now have their own asphalt road visuals
- Added: Highlight graphics to Character List in Inventory during Base Tutorial
- Added: Highlight graphics for Health, Morale, and Infection Bar in Character List in Base Tutorial
- Fixed: Shadows are not displayed in buildings sometimes
- Fixed: Texts corrections
- Fixed: Unnecessary stack of ammo with the amount of 0 is created after dropping a loaded gun to the Ground in Raid
- Fixed: Character controls present at the beginning of Tutorial
- Fixed: Virtual Joystick not becoming transparent when it isn't interactable
- Fixed: Credits can't be closed when they are opened right after the Tutorial is finished
- General bug fixing

- Added: Enabled autologin to GameCenter
- Added: New type of road for military locations
- Added: New textures for City biome
- Added: Small redesign of autoraid report and more icons added
- Changed: Updated existing road textures
- Changed: Roads on global map adjusted to fit with new textures
- Fixed: Weird weapon shots distribution when there is no target
- General bug fixing

Added: Quarry location spawns in Kamensk Quarry
Added: Crossbow spawns in woods and shotguns in later police stations
Added: Messages "Missed" and "Dodged" for melee attacks
Added: Notification icons for push messages
Changed: Silenced weapons produce less noise
Changed: Ghillie suit armor value reduced
Changed: Icon of Intoxication effect
Changed: Intoxication effect from Mushrooms and Alcohol increased
Changed: Range of all ranged weapons increased
Changed: Resource bars showing their current capacities
Changed: Bears and Rusher infected immune to Knockdown attacks stun effect
Fixed: Manual raid not terminated if game is suspended for longer time
Fixed: Rendering in lower resolution on some devices
Fixed: Ghosting effect on character stat bars sometimes incorrectly united multiple subtractions
Fixed: NPC can be visible outside DAR after special attack
Fixed: Ghosting effect on enemy health bar sometimes incorrectly united multiple subtractions
Fixed: Connection lost dialog not showing during tutorial
Fixed: Skipping tutorial may lead to limited UI in game
Fixed: Coast auto-raids working even without food
Fixed: Using healing items on character in regeneration building don't update remaining regeneration time
Fixed: "invisible walls" on sides of military tents
Fixed: Gaps in city roads
Fixed: Bleeding effect indicator sometimes incorrectly hidden
Optimized: Mountain and Combat backpacks spawn rates and locations
Optimized: Firearms distribution in early levels
Optimized: Autoraid enemy encounters and loot spawns
Optimized: Less enemy spawns in, and around suburban and city houses
Optimized: Loot distribution in military levels
Optimized: Mountain backpack repair cost

Multiplayer PvE raids added with option to invite friends
Bandits added
New animals, infected, items and weapons added
New special attacks added
General bug fixing

New weapons and gear added
New location added
New shop options added
Balance changes

新增 PvP 多人模式
新增武器與裝備
某些箱子現在需要鑰匙才能開啟
平衡調整
